fields.name: uri
fields.label: TestURL
fields.description: The slug of the rule e.g. keep-your-urls-clean

fields.name: categories
fields.label: Categories
fields.description: Assigns one or more categories to the rule.

fields.name: category
fields.label: Related Category
fields.description: The related category of the rule

fields.name: sidebarVideo
fields.label: Sidebar Video
fields.description: Add Sidebar Video here. e.g. YouTube Shorts

fields.name: authors
fields.label: Authors
fields.description: The list of contributors for this rule.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The full name of the contributor, as it should appear on the rule.
fields.label: Name

fields.description: The SSW People link for the contributor - e.g. https://ssw.com.au/people/bob-northwind
fields.name: url
fields.label: Url
Related Rules
fields.name: related
fields.description: URIs of related rules to suggest.

fields.label: Rule
fields.name: rule
fields.description: This rule list may not include newly created rules for up to one hour. It is updated based on the main branch after that time.

fields.name: redirects
fields.label: URI Redirects
fields.description: Other URIs which will redirect to this rule.

fields.name: guid
fields.label: Guid
fields.description: If you see this field, contact a dev immediately üò≥ (should be a hidden field generated in the background).

fields.name: seoDescription
fields.label: SEO Description
fields.description: A summary of the page content, used for SEO purposes. This can be generated automatically with AI - See https://www.ssw.com.au/rules/html-meta-tags/#rectifying-the-missing-meta-tags-issue

fields.name: _hidden
fields.label: hidden-field
fields.description: This field is hidden to satisfy GraphQL schema requirements.

fields.label: Rule thumbnail
fields.name: thumbnail
fields.description: Use a JPG or PNG image that is at least 175 x 175px

filename.description: Main category will be "index", top categories will be "{title}/index", and regular categories will use the title as filename

fields.name: uri
fields.label: URI
fields.description: The URI of the top category. Should match the title in lowercase with spaces replaced by dashes (e.g., 'Azure DevOps' -> 'azure-devops')

fields.label: Rules
fields.name: index
fields.description: Note: The rules listed here are only used for sorting on the category page. To assign a category, open the specific rule and select the category there. This list updates automatically based on those assignments, but any rule added directly to this list will not update on its own.
